channel.title: CVE Feed for TAIWAN SECOM CO., LTD., -- Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TAIWAN SECOM CO., LTD., -- Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system

item.title: CVE-2021-35962|2024-09-16T17:44:17.942Z -- taiwan%20secom%20co.%2C%20ltd.%2C -- door%20access%20control%20and%20personnel%20attendance%20management%20system
item.description: Specific page parameters in Dr. ID Door Access Control and Personnel Attendance Management system does not filter special characters. Remote attackers can apply Path Traversal means to download credential files from the system without permission.
